alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clay; Crawford; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 8:55AM CDT until October 31 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Clark, Jasper, Crawford, Clay, Richland and Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will likely end the growing season across southeast IL overnight.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Clay; Crawford; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland
